imdb.plot outline: A Sketch comedy mini-series about the desperation of dating with a twist. The main characters range in culture, sexuality and gender but are all outrageously played by two dynamic female chameleons Rita Qatami and Nsa Ntuk. We follow two characters - Cherise, a wannabe "RnB Diva" and Ahmed, a cheesy Arab guy who has a way with the ladies. Sparks fly over the interracial couple and somebody's Momma gets involved. Ahmed and Cherise go on a date to end up dealing with a melting pot of characters. Finally, Ahmed throws a wild party when Cherise shows up uninvited and a cat fight breaks out, forcing Ahmed to choose his #1 Hollywood girl.
imdb.title: Afro-Arabian Nights
